text: atumallenkil ni ninakkayi svarna nirmitamaya keattaramuntakkuka; ni akasattekk kayarippeavuka; nannalkku vayikkavunna oru grantham irakkittarunnatuvare ni manattekku kayarippeayatayi nannal visvasikkukayilla.” parayuka: "enre nathan parisud'dhan! nan sandesavahakanaya oru manusyan matramakunnu?”
